Text: PGEs InsideTracc Access Cc An account has been established for you in PGEs InsideTracc electronic commerce system Below is your logon ID and temporary password You will be asked to change your password the first time you log on to the system User Name fermis Password d Please use your internet browser to access the URL address pipeline and read the file called INSIDEtracc Access Goes Web Click on Archive of previous News Articles at the bottom of the PipeRanger home page This file contains instructions on how to set up and access InsideTracc on the web Below are instructions to access PGEs InsideTracc system through our dialup system Please use this method only if web access is not available LogonMktdoc If you have any questions or comments please call me at Terri Nicerio Pacific Gas Electric Company Gas System Operations Department
